name: Illogical Fallacies
description: A diplomatic conference on Deep Space Nine becomes a battleground between Bajoran spiritual leaders and Ferengi business owners. But is there something else beneath the surface escalating tensions?
rules:
-- Unique Bajoran, Federation, and Ferengi Traditionalist Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of T'Lyn, Stevens, Mariner, or animated crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: T'Lyn, Stevens, Mariner, or animated crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Becky
featured_crew.flavor: It’s impossible to imagine Mariner as a strict and disciplinarian captain. However, in an alternate universe, she is.

action.name: A Captain Has To Maintain Discipline Above All Else

featured_crew.name: Stevens
featured_crew.flavor: Stevens is a good lieutenant commander, but sometimes he seems to have a talent for attracting trouble.

action.name: Nothing Like A Cold Beer After A Smooth Second Contact!

featured_crew.name: Mariner
featured_crew.flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a bat’leth.

rewards.name: Bajoran Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Becky
rewards.flavor: It’s impossible to imagine Mariner as a strict and disciplinarian captain. However, in an alternate universe, she is.

action.name: A Captain Has To Maintain Discipline Above All Else

rewards.name: Mariner
rewards.flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a bat’leth.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Becky
rewards.flavor: It’s impossible to imagine Mariner as a strict and disciplinarian captain. However, in an alternate universe, she is.

action.name: A Captain Has To Maintain Discipline Above All Else

rewards.name: Mariner
rewards.flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a bat’leth.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

screens.text: "Thank you for answering my hail, Captain. ...please forgive that emotional outburst. Something strange is happening here on Deep Space Nine and everyone appears to be 'on edge', as I believe the human phrase goes."

"You better believe we're 'on edge'! I can't believe the captain made us stop here to resolve some spat at this conference between the Bajorans and Ferengi when we've got a packed schedule! Aren't these people supposed to be diplomats?"
"Lighten up, Stevens! Sheesh! It's a party, even if it is one of those stuffy diplomatic affairs! Maybe if everyone had a drink and settled down, everyone wouldn't be so tense right now!"
"Mariner is correct. The feeling here is more than the tension typical of a 'stuffy diplomatic affair'. I believe that may be why everyone seems so tense. Do you think you could help us, Captain?"
